item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>We're with them too but thanks to Matt's job we get a reduction, our payment is £6 per month for everything! I have a mobile handset Samsung E700 with charger hands free kit and original box etc going if anyone's interested? let me know.Having played cricket at the weekend I feel veri fit and healthy, my new team I play for lost by 1 run! I scored a 4 and another run before being caught. Playing again in 2 weeks time, they must be impressed as it's Norfolk & Suffolk league! They are going to teach me to bowl too. Thank you Woodbridge Ladies Cricket Club</p>
item.content:encoded: We’re with them too but thanks to Matt’s job we get a reduction, our payment is £6 per month for everything! I have a mobile handset Samsung E700 with charger hands free kit and original box etc going if anyone’s interested? let me know.Having played cricket at the weekend I feel veri fit and healthy, my new team I play for lost by 1 run! I scored a 4 and another run before being caught. Playing again in 2 weeks time, they must be impressed as it’s Norfolk & Suffolk league! They are going to teach me to bowl too. Thank you Woodbridge Ladies Cricket Club
